channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: George Clooney: I Love Joe Biden. But We Need a New Nominee.
item.description: I saw Biden three weeks ago at my fund-raiser for him. It’s devastating to say it, but he is not the same man he was, and he won’t win this fall.

item.title: Three West African Countries Exit Regional ECOWAS Bloc
item.description: Burkina Faso, Mali and Niger are withdrawing from a 49-year-old regional alliance that has allowed goods and nearly 400 million people to travel freely across a tightly connected region.

item.title: Jerome Powell’s sudden bearishness on the jobs market is a welcome sign for Wall Street
item.description: "We’re not just an inflation-targeting central bank," Powell told the House Financial Services Committee on the second of two days of semi-annual testimony to Congress. “We also have an employment mandate."

item.title: Three West African Countries Exit Regional ECOWAS Bloc
item.description: Burkina Faso, Mali and Niger are withdrawing from a 49-year-old regional alliance that has allowed goods and nearly 400 million people to travel freely across a tightly connected region.

item.title: Middle East Crisis: Israel Urges Gaza City Residents to Evacuate, Calling It a ‘Combat Zone’
item.description: The Israeli military told Palestinians across the city to move south through four “safe corridors,” a sign that the renewed fighting there would likely continue.

item.title: Astronauts say they’re confident Boeing’s space capsule will get them safely back to Earth, even though it’s had multiple mechanical failures and they should’ve returned weeks ago
item.description: The test flight should have lasted eight days, ending on June 14. Today is July 10.

item.title: Hot Weather Bakes Millions in U.S., as Many in Houston Swelter Without Power
item.description: More than 144 million Americans from the West Coast to the I-95 corridor were under heat advisories and warnings Wednesday.

item.title: Biden Announces Tariffs on Chinese Metals Routed Through Mexico
item.description: The measure aims to close a loophole that officials said allowed metals made partly in China to come into the United States duty free.

item.title: What cognitive tests can show—and what they can’t
item.description: And presidents aside, does the average adult need one?

item.title: How Alec Baldwin Ended Up on Trial for Involuntary Manslaughter
item.description: The fatal shooting on a film set was more than two years and eight months ago. The case has taken a winding path to the courtroom.

item.title: American Climber’s Body Found on Mountain Peru After 22 Years
item.description: Melting glaciers on Peru’s highest mountain helped uncover the body of Bill Stampfl, who disappeared while climbing the mountain with two friends.

item.title: Top economist: Buyers and sellers should brace themselves for the 6% mortgage rate reality
item.description: Mortgage rates won’t be going back down to the historical lows seen throughout the pandemic, the National Association of Realtors’ chief economist said.

item.title: America’s New Catholic Priests: Young, Confident and Conservative
item.description: In an era of deep divisions in the church, newly ordained priests overwhelmingly lean right in their theology, practices and politics.

item.title: U.K. Police Find Man Suspected of Killing 3 Women With Crossbow
item.description: The women died at the scene near London on Tuesday, the police said. The BBC identified the victims as the wife and children of one of its commentators.

item.title: Viral photo of $444 Trader Joe’s receipt sparks new debate over grocery inflation
